title: Plant Bends 10-480-085,White (Pack of 50)
features: Enables you to train leaves or stems to ensure a plant receives as much light as possible
They offer flexible short and side truss support for long and thick truss stems
Can be attached at an early stage of growth
Bendable, so the stem does not have to be forced through the support
They bend with the truss as the stem grows
description: Plant Bends enable you to train leaves or stems to ensure a plant receives as much light as possible. They offer flexible short and side truss support for long and thick truss stems and can be attached at an early stage of growth. Plant Bends are bendable, so the stem does not have to be forced through the support and they bend with the truss as the stem grows.
